keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates are staying at Drum Castle when Wapol approaches to reclaim it
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the confrontation between the Straw Hats and Wapol

description: The pirate crew led by Monkey D. Luffy, currently on Drum Island seeking medical help for Nami.

keyMoments.description: Wapol and his forces arrive at Drum Castle to reclaim the kingdom
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the upcoming battle at Drum Castle

description: The pirate crew formed by the former king Wapol after fleeing Drum Island. They return to reclaim Wapol's throne.
